mapper.select: SELECT E.EMPLOYEE_NO, E.NAME, E.BIRTH_DATE, E.GENDER, E.PHONE, E.ADDRESS, E.HIRE_DATE, E.RESIGN_DATE, E.EMPLOYEE_STATUS, E.LAST_UPDATE, S.JOB_TITLE, S.BASE_SALARY, S.BONUS, S.TOTAL_SALARY, S.LAST_UPDATE AS SALARY_LAST_UPDATE, S.PAYMENT_DATE FROM EMPLOYEE E LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE_SALARY S ON E.EMPLOYEE_NO = S.EMPLOYEE_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EMPLOYEE (EMPLOYEE_NO, NAME, BIRTH_DATE, GENDER, PHONE, ADDRESS, HIRE_DATE, EMPLOYEE_STATUS) VALUES (SEQ_EMPLOYEE_NO.NEXTVAL, #{name}, #{birthDate}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{hireDate}, #{employeeStatus})

INSERT INTO EMPLOYEE_SALARY (EMPLOYEE_NO, JOB_TITLE, BASE_SALARY, BONUS, TOTAL_SALARY, LAST_UPDATE, PAYMENT_DATE) VALUES (#{employeeNo}, #{salary.jobTitle}, #{salary.baseSalary}, #{salary.bonus}, #{salary.totalSalary}, SYSDATE, #{salary.paymentDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE EMPLOYEE SET NAME = #{name}, PHONE = #{phone}, HIRE_DATE = #{hireDate}, RESIGN_DATE = #{resignDate}, EMPLOYEE_STATUS = #{employeeStatus}, BIRTH_DATE = #{birthDate}, GENDER = #{gender}, ADDRESS = #{address}, LAST_UPDATE = SYSDATE WHERE EMPLOYEE_NO = #{employeeNo}

UPDATE EMPLOYEE_SALARY SET JOB_TITLE = #{salary.jobTitle}, BASE_SALARY = #{salary.baseSalary}, BONUS = #{salary.bonus}, TOTAL_SALARY = #{salary.totalSalary}, LAST_UPDATE = SYSDATE, PAYMENT_DATE = #{salary.paymentDate} WHERE EMPLOYEE_NO = #{employeeNo}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EMPLOYEE_SALARY WHERE EMPLOYEE_NO = #{employeeNo}

SELECT E.EMPLOYEE_NO, E.NAME, E.BIRTH_DATE, E.GENDER, E.PHONE, E.ADDRESS, E.HIRE_DATE, E.RESIGN_DATE, E.EMPLOYEE_STATUS, E.LAST_UPDATE, S.JOB_TITLE, S.BASE_SALARY, S.BONUS, S.TOTAL_SALARY, S.LAST_UPDATE AS SALARY_LAST_UPDATE, S.PAYMENT_DATE FROM EMPLOYEE E LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEE_SALARY S ON E.EMPLOYEE_NO = S.EMPLOYEE_NO WHERE E.EMPLOYEE_NO = #{employeeNo}
